content.html: Everything is not misogynistic or supporting feminism.The exact same response would be if a guy did it. By creating such stark lines aren't we building gender stereotypes further and hurting feminism more ?
content.value:
Everything is not misogynistic or supporting feminism.The exact same response would be if a guy did it. 
By creating such stark lines aren't we building gender stereotypes further  and hurting feminism more ?

content.html: "don't call out misogyny because you're hurting feminism". makes sense. if you see a video of a non-minority in tech being bullied so badly they shut down their account bc they showed themselves eating lunch and making a latte, feel free to link it. :)
content.value:
"don't call out misogyny because you're hurting feminism". makes sense.

if you see a video of a non-minority in tech being bullied so badly they shut down their account bc they showed themselves eating lunch and making a latte, feel free to link it. :)
